jsx.ui.layout
Class FlowLayout

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.Configurable
          jsx.ui.Container.Layout
              jsx.ui.layout.AbsoluteLayout
                  jsx.ui.layout.FlowLayout
Direct Known Subclasses:
BarLayout
public class FlowLayout
extends AbsoluteLayout

Layouts children of a container in a flow.

Note, A FlowLayout layout is composed of BarLayout layouts although a BarLayout is also a FlowLayout.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

Field Detail

VERTICAL

public static final Id<java.lang.Boolean> VERTICAL

A global identifier for a configurable property of a FlowLayout object.

The identified configurable property of a FlowLayout object refers to a boolean value specifying whether the layout manager flows vertically the children of the container for which it is doing layout.

Since:
1.0

ORIGIN

public static final Id<java.lang.Integer> ORIGIN

A global identifier for a configurable property of a FlowLayout object.

The identified configurable property of a FlowLayout object refers to an integer number specifying where the layout manager starts to arrange the children of the container for which it is doing layout. Possible values are:

  • LEFTTOP: Starts from top for a vertical flow and from left for a horizontal flow. Aligns the children to left for a vertical flow and to top for a horizontal flow. This is the default value.
  • RIGHTTOP: Starts from top for a vertical flow and from right for a horizontal flow. Aligns the children to right for a vertical flow and to top for a horizontal flow.
  • LEFTBOTTOM: Starts from bottom for a vertical flow and from left for a horizontal flow. Aligns the children to left for a vertical flow and to bottom for a horizontal flow.
  • RIGHTBOTTOM: Starts from bottom for a vertical flow and from right for a horizontal flow. Aligns the children to right for a vertical flow and to bottom for a horizontal flow.

Since:
1.0

LEFTTOP

public static final int LEFTTOP

This constant is a legal value for the ORIGIN configurable property of a FlowLayout object. This is the default value.

Since:
1.0

public FlowLayout(ObjectLike ini)
